job.title: Data Scientist - Data Analytics
job.description: pThis is an environmentnbspstrongunlike anythingstrongnbspstrongin the hightech worldstrongnbspand the secret of Costcos success is its culturenbspThe value Costco puts on its employees is well documented in articles from a variety of publishers including Bloomberg and ForbesnbspOur employees and our members come FIRSTnbspCostco is well known for its generosity and community service and has won many awards for its philanthropy The company joins with its employees to take an active role in volunteering by sponsoring many opportunities to help othersnbspIn 2018 Costco contributed over 39 million to organizations such as United Way and Childrens Miracle Network HospitalsppbrppCostco IT is responsible for thenbspstrongtechnical future of Costco Wholesalestrong the second largest retailer in the world with wholesale operations in twelve countries Despite our size and explosive international expansion we continue to provide a family employee centric atmosphere in which our employees thrive and succeed As proof Costco consistently ranks in thenbspstrongtop five of Forbes Americas Best EmployersstrongppbrppThenbspstrongData Scientist  Data Analyticsnbspstrongis responsible fornbspstronggenerating insights and to augment decision making by the businessstrong At Costco we are on a mission to significantly leverage big data to provide better products and services for our members This role is focused on advanced analytics machine learning and data science delivery to support multiple business areas This role will partner with Product Owner and business owners to build test advanced analytics solutions and turn data into actionable insights This is a senior role to enhance the maturity of advanced analytics methods and coach the team across multiple PODs The Data Scientist is a knowledgeable leader with an ability to lead and is passionate about data and using machine learning to solve business problems The right candidate will havenbspstrongdeep knowledge of applying data science for forecasting customer analysis item and inventory managementstrongnbspand other areas of retailppWe are looking for anbspstronghighly motivated customer focused professionalstrongnbspwho wants to work in a fun and highly collaborative environment and willing to be the player as well as coach for the data science community at CostcoppbrppIf you want to be a part of one of thestrongnbspuBEST to work for companiesunbspin the worldstrong simply apply and let your career be reimaginedppbrppstronguROLEustrongpulliLeads the analysis by applying statistics machine learning and analytic approaches to predict and optimize business outcomesliliDesigns and builds MLDL models to solve business problemsliliCorrectly frames a problem and comes up with a hypothesisliliAssesses the effectiveness and accuracy of models on an ongoing basisliliIdentifies new data that could enhance the quality and accuracy of models to improve predictionsliliCommunicates results effectively with storytelling and visualizationliliCoaches the team in feature engineering using machine learning techniquesliliPerforms peer review for another Data Scientists workliliProvides feedback to enhance the testing framework and MLOpsliliExtends beyond core data science work to perform data wrangling and data preparation as neededliulpbrppstronguREQUIREDustrongpulli5 years experience in delivering business insights using advanced statistical and machine learning models and visualizationliliProficiency in working with diverse databases and other data sourcesliliStrong proficiency in Machine Learning Statistical and Reporting tools Python R SQL PowerBIliliKnowledge of Deep Learning and Neural Networks and its applicationsliliStrong experience working in Cloud AWS Azure based analytics platformliliGraduate degree in Computer Science Data Science and industryliliExperience leading team of data scientistsliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliulpbrppstronguRequired DocumentsustrongpulliCover LetterliliResumeliulpbrppCalifornia applicants please clicknbspherenbspto review the Costco Applicant Privacy NoticeppbrppApart from any religious or disability considerations open availability is needed to meet the needs of the businessnbspIf hired you will be required to provide proof of authorization to work in the United States Applicants and employees for this position will not be sponsored for work authorization including but not limited to H1B visasppp
